discussions.title: How to integrate OAuth authentication?
discussions.body: I'm trying to set up OAuth with Google and GitHub. Has anyone successfully implemented this? Looking for best practices and common pitfalls to avoid...
discussions.author: alex-dev

discussions.title: New dashboard design mockups
discussions.body: Check out these new dashboard designs I've been working on. Would love feedback on the user flow and visual hierarchy. The goal is to make data more accessible...
discussions.author: sarah-designer

discussions.title: API rate limiting improvements
discussions.body: We should implement better rate limiting for the public API. Current implementation is too aggressive and blocks legitimate users. Thoughts on using token bucket vs sliding window?
discussions.author: mike-backend

discussions.title: Database migration issues
discussions.body: Running into problems with the latest migration. Getting constraint violations on user_preferences table. Anyone else seeing this?
discussions.author: jenny-ops

discussions.title: Welcome new team members!
discussions.body: We have 3 new developers joining the team next week. Let's make sure they have everything they need for a smooth onboarding experience.
discussions.author: team-lead

discussions.title: Mobile app performance optimization
discussions.body: The mobile app is feeling sluggish, especially on older devices. Should we implement lazy loading for images and paginate the main feed?
discussions.author: mobile-dev

discussions.title: Coffee chat this Friday?
discussions.body: Anyone interested in grabbing coffee this Friday afternoon? Would be nice to catch up outside of work discussions.
discussions.author: social-coordinator

discussions.title: Docker container startup time
discussions.body: Our Docker containers are taking 2-3 minutes to start up in production. This is causing issues with auto-scaling. Any ideas for optimization?
discussions.author: devops-engineer

discussions.title: Built a cool data visualization tool
discussions.body: Spent the weekend building this interactive chart library. It's specifically designed for our analytics dashboard. Check it out and let me know what you think!
discussions.author: data-viz-expert

discussions.title: Security audit findings
discussions.body: The external security audit is complete. We have 3 high-priority issues and 8 medium-priority ones to address. Creating tickets for each...
discussions.author: security-lead

discussions.title: Testing framework recommendations?
discussions.body: We're evaluating testing frameworks for the frontend. Currently looking at Jest vs Vitest vs Playwright. What are your experiences with these?
discussions.author: qa-engineer

discussions.title: Dark mode implementation
discussions.body: Users have been requesting dark mode for months. I think we should prioritize this for the next sprint. Already have some CSS custom properties set up...
discussions.author: ui-developer

discussions.title: Weekend hackathon results
discussions.body: Amazing projects from last weekend's hackathon! The AI-powered code review tool and the automated deployment pipeline were particularly impressive.
discussions.author: hackathon-organizer

discussions.title: API documentation updates needed
discussions.body: The API docs are getting outdated. Several endpoints have changed and we're missing documentation for the new webhook system. Who can help update these?
discussions.author: tech-writer

discussions.title: Welcome to our community!
discussions.body: This is our first discussion post. We're excited to build this community space where we can share ideas, ask questions, and collaborate on projects.
discussions.author: community-manager
